titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication from the Resident, dated 22 July 1818, which forwarded a Royal firmaun [firman]; the firmaun announced a victory of the Persians over the Afghans. It is noted that the Governor of Bombay approves of the Resident's decision to gift a present to the bearer of the aforementioned Royal firmaun.
